headline.main: British in Middle East; U.S. Supplies Help to Build Strength; India Stands as Reservoir for Armies

lead_paragraph: American merchant vessels steaming into the Suez area and the Persian Gulf are steadily building up British war potential in the Middle East, while the British and Imperial armies are being reinforced from the increasingly powerful reservoir of men and materiel in India.
abstract: H W Baldwin on Brit strength in Middle East

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
